metadata.title: Evaluate to true if the sol-def:smf_test is properly supported
metadata.description: This definition is intended to evalutate to true if the interpreter properly supports the sol-def:smf_test.

notes.note: It is important to note that the values used in this test definition are specific to a particular machine, and may not necessarily apply to your system. As a result, in order to have the definition return a result of 'true', you must either change these values to the ones found on your particular system, or you must configure your system to use these values.

criterion.comment: Test that the smf_object is supported with the Fault Managed Resource Identifier (FMRI) entity equal to some value.
Test that the smf_object is supported with the Fault Managed Resource Identifier (FMRI) entity not equal to some value.
Test that the smf_object is supported with the Fault Managed Resource Identifier (FMRI) entity matching some regular expression.

smf_test.comment: Test that the smf_object is supported with the Fault Managed Resource Identifier (FMRI) entity equal to some value.
Test that the smf_object is supported with the Fault Managed Resource Identifier (FMRI) entity not equal to some value.
Test that the smf_object is supported with the Fault Managed Resource Identifier (FMRI) entity matching some regular expression.

smf_object.comment: Retrieve a smf_item with a Fault Managed Resource Identifier (FMRI) equal to 'svc://localhost/network/ssh:default'.
Retrieve smf_items with a Fault Managed Resource Identifier (FMRI) not equal to 'svc://localhost/network/ssh:default'.
Retrieve smf_items with a Fault Managed Resource Identifier (FMRI) that matches the regular expression 'svc://localhost/network/ssh:.*'.

smf_state.comment: This state represents a smf_item that has a Fault Managed Resource Identifier (FMRI) equal to 'svc://localhost/network/ssh:default' and a service_state that matches the regular expression '^(UNINITIALIZED|OFFLINE|ONLINE|DEGRADED|MAINTENANCE|DISABLED|LEGACY-RUN)$' which matches any valid state.

This state represents smf_items that have a Fault Managed Resource Identifier (FMRI) not equal to 'svc://localhost/network/ssh:default' and a service_state that matches the regular expression '^(UNINITIALIZED|OFFLINE|ONLINE|DEGRADED|MAINTENANCE|DISABLED|LEGACY-RUN)$' which matches any valid state.

This state represents smf_items that have a Fault Managed Resource Identifier (FMRI) that matches the regular expression '^svc://localhost/network/ssh:.*$' and a service_state that matches the regular expression '^(UNINITIALIZED|OFFLINE|ONLINE|DEGRADED|MAINTENANCE|DISABLED|LEGACY-RUN)$' which matches any valid state.

constant_variable.comment: This regular expression matches any of the valid service states: UNINITIALIZED, OFFLINE, ONLINE, DEGRADED, MAINTENANCE, DISABLED, and LEGACY-RUN.
